Package it.polimi.ingsw.utilities.parsers

Class JsonToObjects

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utilities.parsers.JsonToObjects
public class JsonToObjects extends Object
Parser for the jsons which represent the saved games.
Author:
Riccardo Motta

      Parameters:
